txt.en: 'Hoom-hom, little [placeholder]. We did not expect to meet your kind here. Your help was kind, though hardly necessary. Bur√°rum snap as easily as dry twigs.\n\n'Nevertheless, ta-rum, we are grateful for your kindness.'
Andras, believing he was visited by the Ox-spirit, Munfaeril, in a dream, has asked you to defeat the forces of Saruman, who are clear-cutting the edges of Fangorn.
You have defeated Saruman's forces and made the acquaintance of an Ent from Fangorn
Drive Saruman's forces from the eaves of Fangorn.
